name.japanese: シェルズタウン海軍支部

keyEvents.title: Battle Against the Marines
keyEvents.description: Luffy and Zoro fight Captain Morgan's Marine forces in the courtyard of the base.
keyEvents.significance: The climactic battle location where Morgan is defeated and Shells Town is freed.

keyEvents.title: Morgan's Defeat
keyEvents.description: Zoro defeats Captain Morgan in the Marine base courtyard, ending his tyrannical rule.
keyEvents.significance: The location where the Romance Dawn Arc's main conflict is resolved.

keyEvents.title: Ripper Takes Command
keyEvents.description: Ripper becomes the new commander of the 153rd Branch Marine base.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the beginning of new, just leadership at the base.

description: The Marine base in Shells Town, East Blue, formerly commanded by the tyrannical Captain Morgan. The base features a large courtyard and statue of Morgan.
significance: Central location for the conclusion of the Romance Dawn Arc where Luffy and Zoro defeat Morgan and free the town.

statusChanges.description: Morgan defeated and arrested; Ripper takes command with just leadership

keyEvents.title: Victory Celebration
keyEvents.description: The townspeople celebrate their liberation from Morgan's tyranny at Ririka's restaurant/bar.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the gratitude and relief of the townspeople after being freed.

keyEvents.title: Luffy and Zoro's Departure
keyEvents.description: Luffy and Zoro sail away from Shells Town while the townspeople and Marines watch.
keyEvents.significance: Concludes the Romance Dawn Arc and marks the beginning of Luffy's journey with his first crew member.

description: A small town in the East Blue that was under the oppressive rule of Marine Captain Morgan until Luffy and Zoro freed it.
significance: The town where Zoro joins Luffy's crew and where Koby begins his Marine career.
